alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 07 at 9:41AM EDT until April 08 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Vermont, Bennington County. In New York, Eastern Rensselaer County. In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest wind gusts will likely occur late this afternoon into this evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
